fields.label: Left Copy
fields.value:
Buyer Side Transaction Management

  • Verify appraisals
  • Ensure submission of association application
  • Facilitate intercommunication of all parties involved
  • Draft all transaction addendums, executed, and delivered to all parties
  • Review Estoppel if necessary
  • Review purchase agreement for accuracy
  • Communicate introductions and timeline to all parties
  • Deliver the contract to Title Company and lender
  • Coordinate home inspections and escrow deposits
  • Receive and deliver loan commitment
  • Complete Greensheet (applicable for KW agents)
  • Request DA and send to title company (applicable for KW agents)
  • Verify clear to close and figures/loan documents delivered to title for closing
  • Schedule final walk through and closing times with buyer or seller, agents and title company

fields.label: Right Copy
fields.value:
Listing Side Transaction Management

  • Prepare all necessary addenda
  • Track all critical dates
  • Coordinate Repair estimates
  • Coordinate seller documents with title co. or attorney
  • Obtain loan commitment
  • Verify appraisals
  • Review purchase agreement for completion and accuracy
  • Supply executed documents to all parties
  • Email welcome letter/introductory email & critical dates to all parties
  • Review and add all contract/critical dates to calendar/CRM (Dotloop)
  • Obtain HOA documents from seller and deliver to buyer
  • Maintain consistent contact with title company, buyer’s agent, lender, listing agent
  • Complete Greensheet (only applicable for KW agents)
  • Request DA and send to title company (only applicable for KW agents)
  • Verify clear to close and figures/loan documents delivered to title for closing
  • Set up walk through and closing with relevant parties
  • Troubleshoot issues throughout the transaction

value.title: Tab Bar
value.content:
This is a tab bar powered by Alpine.js

Tab bars are used to break information up into distinct sections which are too succinct to warrant their own pages. If one of the sections were to get too large, it should go on its own page to avoid cramming a small container full of words.

value.title: Powered by
value.content:
All it takes to use a JS library is a single line

Thanks to the magic of Skypack and a little Regex, all you have to do to import and use a JavaScript library is import Alpine from 'alpinejs'. Skypack send preautomized packages to everyone who visits your site. Note that JS libraries used this way won't work in IE11.

value.title: Alpine.js
value.content:
Alpine makes it easy to sprinkle in interactivity

AlpineJS is "A rugged, minimal framework for composing JavaScript behavior in your markup". Once you use a library in one component, you can use it from other components without any additional overhead (since it's cached from then on).
